articles.title: Over 100 Million Affected By Canada Wildfires In North America: 5 Points - NDTV
articles.description: At least 100 million people across Canada and the US are facing serious health risks due to the wildfires in Canada. Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has said Canada is living through its "worst wildfire season" in recorded history.
articles.content:
• Over 3.8 million hectares - about double the size of New Jersey - have been scorched so far, according to the Canadian National Fire Database.
  • More than 20,000 people have been displace… [+1091 chars]

articles.title: WATCH: Reds' Elly De La Cruz's first MLB home run almost leaves Great American Ball Park - CBS Sports
articles.description: De La Cruz's homer went 458 feet and left the bat at 114.8 mph
articles.content: Tuesday night Cincinnati Reds wunderkind Elly De La Cruz made his big league debut, smashing a rocket double for his first MLB hit and going 1 for 3 with two walks against the Los Angeles Dodgers. De… [+2980 chars]
